text: Dmytro Grabovskyy (, 30 September 1985 â€“ 23 January 2017) was a Ukrainian- Israeli professional road bicycle racer. He was born in Simferopol, Ukraine. He last competed for UCI Continental team ISD-Lampre. He was second in the time trial for juniors at the 2005 World Championship Cycling in Madrid and he won the road race. Grabovsky became an Israeli citizen in 2014. He died from a heart attack on 23 January 2017, aged 31. ==References== ==Other websites== * Profile of Dmytro Grabovskyy at Cycling Archives.com Category:1985 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Ukrainian cyclists Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction Category:Jewish Israeli sportspeople Category:Naturalized citizens of Israel Category:Soviet Jews Category:Ukrainian Jews
title: Dmytro Grabovskyy
